content: using crochet hearts you can make a shamrock for st patrick s day or a 4-leaf lucky clover easy to make just crochet the hearts and sew them together finished size appliqué is about 1-3/4 wide and 2 tall materials crochet cotton thread size 10 crochet hook size 4/2 mm free version of this pattern is available on my website https https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-st-patricks-day-shamrock/ by purchasing this listing you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format
